That's a fantastic habit to have! Packing a reusable water bottle is a great way to reduce plastic waste and save money. Many airports also offer water refill stations, making it easy to fill up your bottle before your flight.

It's amazing how small changes like this can make a big impact on the environment. As travelers, we have the power to make conscious choices that can help reduce our carbon footprint. By packing a reusable water bottle, you're not only helping to reduce plastic waste but also setting a great example for others to follow.

Remember to also consider other eco-friendly habits while traveling, such as:

* Choosing accommodations with sustainable practices
* Using public transportation or walking instead of taxis
* Avoiding single-use plastics like straws and cutlery
* Supporting local businesses and communities
* Being mindful of your energy consumption and turning off lights and electronics when not in use

Every small action counts, and by making these conscious choices, we can all contribute to a more sustainable future.

Now, are you ready to explore Seoul and make some amazing memories?
